title: Rammus Ganking Reverse Annie
body:
So OP, rito pls nerf quill coat kappa

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HhNGdnuFQYM

Observe how he comes back for repeat ganks after the flash was used, ensuring a continued advantage for his mid laner even though they failed to participate in the gank.

replies.body:
AHHHH IT'S THE BACONHAWK <3

*ahem* I mean, I'm glad you liked it. :3

(sorry for necro reply, I was away on family vacation but I had to reply to the reds)
I NEED A PET ARMADILLO IMMEDIATELY.

I clicked this link, not expecting such an adorable video. :3 

Day = made.
You were in a game with me ahwile back :O
Woah, holy crap! I remember your name!~
Oh whoops new to boards didnt know you replied haha

AHHHH IT'S KATEY <3

*ahem* I mean, I'm glad you liked it. :3

(sorry for necro reply, I was away on family vacation but I had to reply to the reds)
He shows no mercy as he taunts her into a fearless battle, getting her low, retreating and circling back when his cooldowns are up, ensuring a kill. Quite a force to be reckoned with.
Annie misplayed that. If she had her stun up she could have gotten away.
I didn't know armadillos were that "aggressive." And by aggressive, I mean cute.

Wow, adorable.
What tricks can he/she do?
What does he/she even eat?
misplay by annie because she overextended with no minion and did not return to base causing the second gank to happen. Also, there was no counter gank from her team's jungler. (so cute)
